checkitem.compliant: ((NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.02' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.024.03' OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.03' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.031.00') )
checkitem.noncompliant: ((NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,6) = '2.00.0' AND NOT(substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.024.03') OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.03' AND NOT(substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.031.00') ) )
